sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row>
        <v-row class="px-3">
            <v-col cols="12" sm="8">
                <v-sheet min-height="350" rounded="lg">                   
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>          
            <v-col cols="12" sm="4">
                <v-sheet min-height="350" rounded="lg">
                    <v-timeline side="end">
                        <v-timeline-item
                        v-for="item in careerItems"
                        :key="item.id"
                        :dot-color="item.color"
                        size="small"
                        >
                        <v-alert
                            :value="true"
                            :color="item.color"
                            :icon="item.icon"
                        >
                            Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, no nam oblique veritus. Commune scaevola imperdiet nec ut, sed euismod convenire principes at. Est et nobis iisque percipit, an vim zril disputando voluptatibus, vix an salutandi sententiae.
                        </v-alert>
                        </v-timeline-item>
                    </v-timeline>          
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>            
            <v-col v-for="card in cards" :key="card" cols="12" sm="6">
                <v-sheet class="overflow-auto" height="350px">
                    <v-list lines="two">
                        <v-list-subheader>자격증 리스트</v-list-subheader>
                        <template v-for="(item, i) in certificateItems" :key="i">
                            <v-list-item>
                                <template v-slot:prepend>
                                    <v-avatar>
                                        <v-img src="https://freeiconshop.com/wp-content/uploads/edd/certificate-flat.png"></v-img>
                                    </v-avatar>
                                </template>
                                <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
                                <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ item.date }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
                            </v-list-item>
                            <v-divider v-if="i !== 4" :key="`divider-${i}`" inset></v-divider>
                        </template>
                    </v-list>                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="12" sm="6">
                <v-sheet min-height="350" rounded="lg">                 
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>          
        </v-row>
    </v-row>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data: () => ({
        cards: ['경력 리스트'],
        certificateItems: [
            { title: '컴퓨터그래픽스운용기능사', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '웹디자인기능사', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: 'GTQ(포토샵) 1급', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: 'GTQI(일러스트) 1급', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: 'JLPT(일본어) 3급', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '조경기능사', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '레크레이션강사', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '웃음치료사', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '펀리더쉽지도자', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '운전면허증 1종', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
        ],
        careerItems: [
        {
          color: 'red-lighten-2',
          icon: 'mdi-star',
        },
        {
          color: 'purple-lighten-2',
          icon: 'mdi-book-variant',
        },
        {
          color: 'green-lighten-1',
          icon: 'mdi-airballoon',
        },
        {
          color: 'indigo-lighten-2',
          icon: 'mdi-layers-triple',
        },
      ],
    }),
    beforeUnmount () {
      clearInterval(this.interval)
    },
    mounted () {
      this.interval = setInterval(() => {
        if (this.value === 80) {
          return (this.value = 80)
        }
        this.value += 10
      }, 100)
    },
}
</script>
